front.title: A Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol Option for Requesting and Receiving a Uniform Resource Identifier

abstract.t: This document defines a new Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHC) Option to deliver a Location-to-Service Translation (LoST) Protocol URI to a client. This SIP(S)-URI will be become the destination URI in any call set-up message to a Public Safety Answering Point (PSAP) in times of an emergency.
